ROM.Changelog:
* **dotOS Changelog** ------------------- Droid On Time!
* Version bump to v1.2 * Merged December Security patch * More visual bug fixes * QS tiles track color accent in Dot O theme. * Dot pixel theme has been made to have the same O white feel except with no QS tiles tint. * Added Network Indicator (Settings->Data Usage). * Added Changelog section inside About. * New settings icons. * Re-work on overall app icons. * Some new dope walls. * Fixed time keep service. * And many more bug fixes and performace enhancements.
